article_title: Chishti will vote for a ceasefire motion.
sentence: Rehman  Chishti,  a  Conservative  MP,  says:  "In  the  backdrop  of  this  debate  we  saw  the  terrible  loss  of  innocent  lives,  29,000  Palestinians  have  lost  their  lives,  1,200  Israelis    and  88  journalists  have  been  killed.  "
